countryComponents

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • countryComponents.State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<State>

    public class State
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<State>, java.io.Serializable
    Project #4 CS 2334, Section 010 April 16, 2015

    Holds an ArrayList of Cities and provides methods for searching that list

    Version:
    2.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • findCity

        public City findCity(java.lang.String cityName)
        Searches for and returns a City with a name that exactly matches cityName.
        Parameters:
        cityName - the name of the City to find.
        Returns:
        A City with a name that exactly matches the search parameter if one is found, otherwise returns null.
